AUTH_MESSAGES.FAILED_LOGIN:
Sorry, the email / password combination is not valid. Please try again.
If the problem persists, kindly call support.
AUTH_MESSAGES.FAILED_REGISTRATION:
Sorry, there was an error during the registration.
Please try again. If the problem persists, kindly call support.
AUTH_MESSAGES.EXISTS_PHONE:
Sorry, the specified phone number is already registered in the system.
If you feel this is not correct, kindly call support.
AUTH_MESSAGES.EXISTS_EMAIL:
Sorry, the specified email is already registered in the system.
If you feel this is not correct, kindly call support.
AUTH_MESSAGES.EMAIL_NOT_EXISTS:
Sorry, the specified email is not registered in the system.
If you feel this is not correct, kindly call support.
AUTH_MESSAGES.INVALID_EMAIL: Invalid Email so please enter correct email
AUTH_MESSAGES.INVALID_PASSWORD: Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.
AUTH_MESSAGES.UNAUTHENTICATED:
Sorry, you are not authenticated to perform this action.
If you feel this is not correct, kindly call support.
AUTH_MESSAGES.INVALID_PARAMETERS: Sorry, the request could not be processed as because of invalid parameters.
AUTH_MESSAGES.INVALID_PHONE: Sorry! The specified phone number is invalid.
AUTH_MESSAGES.INVALID_TOKEN_VERIFICATION: Sorry! The verification token is invalid.

ADDRESS_ADDED: The new address has been registered successfully!
ADDRESS_DELETE_PRIMARY:
Sorry, the address you are trying to delete is set as primary.
Please set a new primary address to delete this one.
ADDRESS_DELETED: The address has been deleted from your profile.
ADDRESS_NOT_ADDED: Some error occurred while creating the new address
CART_NOT_CREATED: Some error occurred while creating the cart
CART_NOT_FOUND: Sorry! The requested cart could not be found!
CART_UPDATED: Item updated to cart updated successfully.
PRODUCT_NOT_FOUND: Sorry! The requested product could not be found!
PRODUCT_NOT_CREATED: Some error occurred while creating the post
PAYMENT_NOT_CREATED: Some error occurred while creating the payment
PLANS_NOT_CREATED: Some error occurred while creating the plan
PLANS_NOT_FOUND: Sorry! The requested plan could not be found!
EVENT_NOT_CREATED: Some error occurred while creating the event
EXISTS_ITEM:
Sorry, the specified item can not be deleted.
Remove the corrosponding items first then delete.
FAILED_DB_CONNECTION: Error occurred while trying to connect to the database.
FAILED_VERIFICATION:
Sorry, your email could not be verified.
Please try again. If the problem persists, kindly call support.
FIELD_REQUIRE: Email and Password is required to login
GENERAL: Sorry! Something went wrong with the request. Please try again later.
ITEM_NOT_CREATED: Some error occurred while creating the item
ITEM_NOT_DELETED: Some error occurred while deleting the item
ITEM_NOT_FOUND: Sorry! The requested resource could not be found!
ITEM_NOT_RETRIEVED: Some error occurred while retrieving the item
ITEM_NOT_UPDATED: Some error occurred while updating the item
NOT_FOUND:
Sorry, no entry could be found for the specified criteria.
If you feel this is not correct, kindly call support.
USER_NOT_EXIST: User does not exist in the system
